Commentary: Sohail Tanvir to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR
Sohail Tanvir to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
Sohail Tanvir to Kamran Akmal, no run
Sohail Tanvir to Kamran Akmal, no run
Sohail Tanvir to Kamran Akmal, no run
Sohail Tanvir to Kamran Akmal, no run
Aamer Yamin to Tamim Iqbal, OUT
Wicket: ['Tamim Iqbal c & b Aamer Yamin 5 (3b 1x4 0x6) SR: 166.66']

Commentary: Aamer Yamin to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, short and wide ball, stays in the crease and crunches it through covers for four
Aamer Yamin to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, good length ball, defended back to the bowler
Aamer Yamin to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, overpitched ball, comes down the crease and blocks it to mid-on
Aamer Yamin to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, full and wide outside off, presses forward to drive and skews it off the inside part of the bat back to the bowler
Aamer Yamin to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, slower length ball, gets an outside edge and the ball goes on the bounce to the wicketkeeper
Sohail Tanvir to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, short and wide outside off, Kamran crunches it through cover-point and the ball races to the boundary
Sohail Tanvir to Kamran Akmal, no run, good length ball, cramps Kamran for room and the ball is defended into the off side
Sohail Tanvir to Kamran Akmal, no run, length ball on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
Sohail Tanvir to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, short and wide ball, tries to fetch a pull from outside off and mistimes it. Ends up dragging it towards mid-on
Sohail Tanvir to Kamran Akmal, 4 byes, length ball, swinging back in sharply, Akmal swings and misses and the wicketkeeper flings himself to his left and misses the ball as well
Sohail Tanvir to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, short of a length, knocks it to mid-on for a quick single and keeps the strike
Aamer Yamin to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, short of a length, angling into the pads, tucked to midwicket
Aamer Yamin to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, comes down the track and plays it to mid-on
Aamer Yamin to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, short of a length, angling in on leg, swivels around and pulls to backward square leg
Aamer Yamin to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, short ball, angling in on leg again and this time it's slower in pace and the batsman does not make contact as he tries to pull it
Aamer Yamin to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, back of a length and angling in, tucked with the angle to square leg
Aamer Yamin to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, too short and a little too straight. Not much pace and sits up nicely, Kamran swivels around and pulls it away to deep backward square leg
Narine to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, flat length ball at pace outside off, comes forward and defends back to the bowler
Narine to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, tossed up on off, clipped off the pads to midwicket. They think of the second but decide against it as the ball is picked up

Narine to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, flat, short and wide outside off, rocks back and cuts in front of point. They set off for a quick single and backward point runs across and fields it. Fires a throw at the bowler's end and Narine opts to not get behind the stumps and let the ball hit the stumps. Except that it does not and they take the overthrow
Narine to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, fuller ball, comes forward and drives through covers
Narine to Mohammad Hafeez, no run

Narine to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, Narine fires a tempter outside off and the batsman comes forward. Does not get to the pitch of this length ball and gets an outside edge as the ball goes to the third man boundary
Ghulam Mudassar to Kamran Akmal, no run, length ball on leg stump, tries to flick it into the leg side and gets an inside edge to the pads
Ghulam Mudassar to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, short of a length, sitting up nicely, swivels around and pulls through deep backward square leg
Ghulam Mudassar to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, width on offer outside off, waits for it at the crease and opens the face of his bat before steering it away to square third man
Ghulam Mudassar to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, short of a length on leg stump, tries to pull it away fine and gets it off the inside edge to the thigh as the ball rolls away fine
Ghulam Mudassar to Kamran Akmal, no run, good length ball, angled across the right-hander on off-stump channel, Kamran presses forward and defends with bat close to pad

Ghulam Mudassar to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, poor delivery. Short ball down the leg side, no pace and not much bounce, pulled away. Fine leg is inside the circle and the ball will comfortably beat him to the boundary
Narine to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, tries to steer this short of a length ball away but cannot beat short third man

Narine to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, rapped on the pads. appeal for lbw but turned down. Nicely flighted fullish ball, tries to flick it away but there is sharp turn in to the right-hander. Seems like impact was outside off
Narine to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, hops back and tucks it into the midwicket region
Narine to Kamran Akmal, no run, width on offer outside off, crunches a drive to covers

Narine to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, flat length ball, just outside off, deftly played by Kamran. Beautiful late use of the wrists, cuts it well wide of the first slip fielder and the ball goes to the third man boundary
Narine to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, drags it wider outside off this time and it is slapped out to deep point
Yasir Shah to Kamran Akmal, no run, pitched up on leg stump, driven to covers where McCullum puts in a dive to stop it

Yasir Shah to Kamran Akmal, no run, beautifully done. Goes for an expansive drive but this one spins away a mile and comfortably beats the outside edge of the flashing blade. The wicketkeeper takes off the bails and makes an excited appeal for stumped. The foot did go up momentarily but he has planted it back in by the time the bails are whipped off
Yasir Shah to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, comes forward to this fuller ball that is sliding in and pushes it down to long-off
Yasir Shah to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, floated up outside off, driven off the front foot to covers and McCullum at short cover is at it again, flings himself to his left and stops it

Yasir Shah to Mohammad Hafeez, OUT, bowled him. Hafeez attempts a cheeky paddle sweep after going across and he has lost his leg stump. And Peshawar have lost their second wicket. It pitched outside leg and Hafeez exposed the leg stick. He fails to make contact on the sweep and the stump is uprooted
Yasir Shah to Samuels, 2 runs, opens the bat face with soft hands and works it wide of short third man

Elliott to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, width on offer outside off and he has split the gap with surgical precision. Opens the bat face and plays a late cut that goes between backward point and short third man
Elliott to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, fuller ball at 107.9 kph on off, driven to sweeper cover
Elliott to Samuels, no run, good length ball outside off, strides forward and opens the bat face to steer it to backward point
Elliott to Samuels, 1 run, fullish ball, drilled down to long-on where the fielder runs to his left and picks it up
Elliott to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, fullish length ball, not much pace again and it is eased down to long-on
Elliott to Samuels, no run, short and wide outside off, cuts but does not get it off the middle of the bat and chops it to covers

Yasir Shah to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, gets down to sweep early and the ball is on a length and on the leg stump channel. The ball is swept to to backward square leg where Yamin makes a mess of it. runs across and rolls down to his left but lets the ball go from between his legs. Slightly over-ran it
Yasir Shah to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, swept towards fine leg where the fielder covers it just fine this time and will keep it to two
Yasir Shah to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, swept out to deep fine leg again
Yasir Shah to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, short ball, flat trajectory and spinning away, tries to pull it away and ends up dragging it down to long-on
Yasir Shah to Samuels, 1 run, short and some width on offer outside off, cut out to deep point where sweeper cover runs across and fields it
Yasir Shah to Kamran Akmal, no run, pitched up on leg, comes forward and pushes it towards cover
Elliott to Samuels, 1 run, fuller ball, clipped away into the vacant spaces on the leg side, to the left of the square leg umpire
Elliott to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, good length on the stumps, comes forward and pushes it and the fielder at extra cover does not get down to his right fully and lets it go. Lazy effort
Elliott to Samuels, 1 run, too full, eased down to long-on

Elliott to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, short of a length ball, Kamran plays the late cut and places it beautifully, manages to steer it wide of the diving short third man fielder and though it stays in the air, he has placed it perfectly and the ball gets comfortably away from the fielder

Elliott to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, gets down to paddle it and uses the pace on Elliott's delivery. Moves across and puts the bat down in time, comes on to him at a comfortable full length and the ball goes away into the fine leg boundary
Elliott to Kamran Akmal, 2 runs, short and wide, cut square of the wicket, wide of deep backward point

Yasir Shah to Samuels, no run, that's a beaut! Superb loopy delivery that lands on leg, pushes the batsman back and spins viciously past the outside edge as he tries to force it through the off side and sticks his bat out
Yasir Shah to Samuels, 1 run, driven out to sweeper cover
Yasir Shah to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, short of a length, spinning away wide outside off and it is cut away to sweeper cover
Yasir Shah to Samuels, no run, flights it up generously and the ball spins away sharply, The batsman sees the width and tries to cut but it is a tad full and he gets beaten
Yasir Shah to Samuels, 1 run, fuller ball, clipped away to midwicket

Yasir Shah to Kamran Akmal, OUT, goes for an expansive drive and the ball is full and wide. Kamran has to reach out for it and misses out on the drive. The bails are whipped off and the keeper is confident this time. Kamran's foot is outside the crease as the keeper was collecting the bails and he tries to land the foot entirely but it seems as though no part of the shoe is behind the line. It seems like it is on the line and the TV umpire looks at three different angles. It's as close as it gets. And it is given out
Narine to Samuels, 1 run, full on off, driven to long-on
Narine to Shakib Al Hasan, no run, beats the batsman with sharp turn and bounce outside off
Wicket: ['Kamran Akmal st †Mohammad Rizwan b Yasir Shah 58 (40b 9x4 0x6) SR: 145.00']

Commentary: Narine to Shakib Al Hasan, no run, tries to cut abut there is turn and bounce, gets big on him and he cannot make contact
Narine to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, fullish outside off, comes forward and pushes it through point
Narine to Samuels, 1 run, flat length ball, stays in the crease and tucks it away to deep midwicket
Narine to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, some turn from the back of a length region and Shakib makes further room by backing away before cutting it out to sweeper cover
Yasir Shah to Shakib Al Hasan, no run, spins back in from outside off, defended back to the bowler

Yasir Shah to Shakib Al Hasan, 4 byes, missed everything has it? Flighted outside off on a fullish length and the ball spins back in a mile. Shakib was looking to drive but it turns from outside off, misses the inside edge, misses the leg stump and misses the keeper as it goes through fine leg
Yasir Shah to Shakib Al Hasan, no run, tries to sweep and gets an inside edge to the pad

Yasir Shah to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, Very tough caught-and bowled chance, put down. Goes for a straight drive that is partly stopped by the bowler and the ball is eventually fielded at long-on. It was actually a caught-and-bowled and Yasir stuck his hand out but could not hold on to it
Yasir Shah to Samuels, 2 runs, tossed up outside off, crunched through extra cover
Yasir Shah to Samuels, 1 leg bye, sliding down leg and the batsman misses the attempted tuck, wears it on the pad as the ball rolls away into the leg side
Aamer Yamin to Samuels, 1 run, tries to slog it away and gets an inside edge as the ball goes along the ground to deep square leg
Aamer Yamin to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, short of a length, not much room but he tries to cut. Does not find the middle of the bat as the ball goes down to third man
Aamer Yamin to Samuels, 1 run, short and wide, backs away and slaps and point runs across to his left before diving to stop it
Aamer Yamin to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs, slapped through backward point for a brace
Aamer Yamin to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR, comes down the track and slices it over point. Intention was to go over cover but he does not get to the pitch of the ball
Aamer Yamin to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, opens the bat face to steer it to third man
Ghulam Mudassar to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, short of good length, mistimes a pull from outside off as he sends it wide of midwicket
Ghulam Mudassar to Samuels, 1 run, backs away and cuts to third man

Ghulam Mudassar to Shakib Al Hasan, SIX, goes for a yorker but instead fires a full toss on the stumps that is picked up off the pads nicely by Shakib. Sails cleanly over deep midwicket and that is the first six of the innings, in the 16th over
Ghulam Mudassar to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR, walks across to the off side and plays a half-scoop half-pull that goes past short fine leg. The fielder dives but over the ball and cannot stop it
Ghulam Mudassar to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, full, wide, throws everything at it and gets a healthy outside edge that flies down towards third man
Ghulam Mudassar to Samuels, no run, yorker, wide outside off, Samuels cannot squeeze it out through the off side as he jams the bat down
Narine to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, backs away to make a lot of room but the bowler follows him and the ball is slapped away to deep extra cover

Narine to Samuels, 2 runs, cuts this shorter ball i front of point and they set off for a quick single. The ball is picked up and a direct throw is fired at the bowler's end. They take the overthrow off the ricochet and there is another throw at the keeper's end that narrowly misses the stumps. Could have been gone there if a direct throw was fired

Narine to Samuels, OUT, Samuels' painful stay comes to an end. Narine gets one to skid in and Samuels is looking to force it through the off side. Neither forward nor back and ends up making a weal attempt at a cut shot from too close to the body. He misses as the ball crashes into the stumps
Narine to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, pitched up on off side, comes forward and dabs it into the leg side
Narine to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, width on offer outside off, slapped through extra cover
Narine to Shahid Afridi, no run, comes forward to meet the pitch and turns this away to the forward short leg region as the bowler darts across to collect it
Sohail Tanvir to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, fullish outside off, 121 kph, drilled down to long-off

Sohail Tanvir to Shahid Afridi, FOUR, full toss outside off, throws his hands hard at it and skews it off the outside edge. The ball goes well inside where the short third man fielder is and into the boundary

Sohail Tanvir to Shahid Afridi, 2 runs, angling in on leg stump, Afridi pushes it to covers and takes off for a single. Needless throw fired at the non-striker's end and they take the overthrow as it misses the stumps and there is no one backing up

Sohail Tanvir to Shahid Afridi, 2 runs, tries to go big over the off side and ends up slicing it. The ball is in the air and drops in between the lonmg-off and sweeper cover region with two fielders converging in on it
Sohail Tanvir to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, yorker outside off, tries to force it through the off side and gets an inside edge to short fine leg

Sohail Tanvir to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, very full ball, angling in on leg, tries to dig it out into the leg side but gets an inside edge to the pads and the ball rolls into the off side. They take a leg bye as the bowler picks it up on the follow-through
Aamer Yamin to Shakib Al Hasan, no run, fuller ball, stays in the crease and punches it firmly but straight back to the bowler

Aamer Yamin to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs, OUT, Run out chance and it is referred upstairs. And that's gone. Afridi is well short of the crease and the big scoreen flashes the big three red letters much to the dismay of the crowd. Coming to the delivery, it was a fuller ball outside off and Shakib slices it over the backward point region. The ball drops short of the third man boundary and Afridi calls for a third but cannot make it back as the wicketkeeper collects the throw and takes the bails off
Aamer Yamin to Sammy, no run, full and wide, it's a yorker outside off, tries to squeeze it out through the off side and does not make contact
Aamer Yamin to Sammy, no run, short of good length, Sammy swivels around with the pull shot but messes up the timing and inside-edges it to the pad
Aamer Yamin to Sammy, 1 run, short of a length outside off, Sammy flays it hard with an angled bat. But he gets no timing on that at all and the ball lands in front of the mid-off fielder
Aamer Yamin to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run, fullish and angling in on leg stump, Shakib chips it towards long-on and the ball goes on the bounce to the fielder there

Sohail Tanvir to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT, full ball and Shakib tries to loft it down the ground. Gets a lot of elevation but not the desired distance as there is not much pace on that delivery. Umar Akmal at long-on settles under it and snaffles it
Sohail Tanvir to Sammy, 2 runs, flicked uppishly into the leg side and the ball goes on the bounce towards the deep square leg fielder running to his left

Sohail Tanvir to Sammy, FOUR, short ball, swivvels around and pulls and the ball goes to the deep backward square leg boundary. It stays in the air and Ghulam makes a valiant diving attempt as he flings himself to his right but the ball goes straight through the hands
Sohail Tanvir to Sammy, 2 runs, fullish ball outside off, jams the bat down and drills it to wide long-off
Sohail Tanvir to Sammy, SIX, full, angling in, Sammy picks it up off the pads and flicks it and the ball sails flat and clean over deep midwicket. That's pure power, no other way to describe that
Sohail Tanvir to Sammy, 2 runs, flays it straight back over the bowler's head and the ball goes to long-off. Wahab sprints back for the second
Wicket: ['Shakib Al Hasan c Umar Akmal b Sohail Tanvir 30 (24b 2x4 1x6) SR: 125.00']
